=== Ubuntu Women Team ===
* <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2010-March/thread.html|Announced Winners]]</nowiki> of the International Women's Day Competition on <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/InternationalWomensDay/HowIDiscoveredUbuntu|How I discovered Ubuntu]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2010-March/002578.html|Began discussion]]</nowiki> on future team leadership
* <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2010-March/002569.html|Began discussion]]</nowiki> on team <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu-women.org/+spec/ubuntu-women-project-m-goals|blueprint for -M cycle]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2010-March/002639.html|Began discussion]]</nowiki> on creation of a team blog
* <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2010-March/002656.html|Began discussion]]</nowiki> on wiki translations
* Team meeting on <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Meetings/20100325|March 25]]</nowiki>
* Team meeting on <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Meetings/20100302|March 2]]</nowiki>
* Hosted <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2010-March/002624.html|#ubuntu-women Channel Ops Class]]</nowiki> in #ubuntu-classroom
* <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2010-March/002647.html|Announced Ubuntu Women Article]]</nowiki> by Amber in <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-user.com/|Ubuntu User Magazine]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://twit.tv/floss114|FLOSS Weekly interview with Amber]]</nowiki> where she discusses the project (and other women in F/OSS related topics)
* <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Interviews|Interviews Series]]</nowiki> for Full Circle Magazine published <nowiki>[[http://fullcirclemagazine.org/issue-35/|Issue 35]]</nowiki> with interview of Amber Graner
